thought: To craft a crimson_door, I first need to craft crimson_planks. Crimson planks require placing 1 stripped_crimson_hyphae in the crafting grid, and therefore I will first need to move the stripped_crimson_hyphae from slot 34 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1
